Special Powers
CONSTRUCT: FREE: If no Construct generated by The Flash was on your force this turn, generate a Blue Construct.

April 1, 2021
Redrover454
Like all of the 50pt chases in this set, he's a great package for the points. His construct is a nice secondary attacker, and though the terrain removal won't always get used, when it can, it can make a huge difference. The top dial 3dmg phasing/flurry is great, and it's awesome to see Barry get the Defense values he deserves. It's his bottom dial that really sells him for me though. With his 2 targets and flurry, under the new rules he can drop a token on up to 4 people, or double token two people! The ESD might seem like a poor choice for a close combat character, but ideally with that Flurry/Incap, the people you're adjacent to won't be making any attacks. Pair him with the Waldo Arms for extra field control and staying power, or the Power Gem to dish out piles of damage!
